servComm: (input, sm, ss, sms, em, es, ems) => `ffmpeg -ss ${sm}:${ss}:${sms} -i ${input} -to ${em}:${es}:${ems} -c copy ${input.split(.")[0]+"-timetrim."+input.split(".")[1]}`"
